C0Stitch2: ^Hey, pal! Did I make it, am I the first one??
C0Stitch3: ^I am!? Awesome! I woke up early and everything- I wanted to be your first customer!
C0Stitch4: ^I know how long you’ve been wanting to get this place started and look at you! Opening day of the first smoothie shop in town!
C0Stitch5: ^I guess I should order something, huh? Hm… it’s going to be a long day in the garden. I know it’ll need to have <color=red>ice…</color>!
C0Stitch6: ^I actually got in a new shipment of flowers, I can’t wait for you to see them!
C0Stitch7: ^Know what? Let’s go all out. Let’s do <color=red>strawberry</color> and <color=red>banana</color>!

C0GStitch1: ^Ooh perfect! Man this is definitely gonna be my new spot. You did a great job.
C0GStitch2: ^You know… I’ve been thinking of starting to grow fruit. I’m actually trying out some stuff now. If you want, I can bring it by and you can have a special!
C0GStitch3: ^I think that would be neat… occasional fruit special! Let me know what you think- later though! Let’s get through your first day, first!

C0BStitch1: ^Huh… not exactly what I wanted but hey! It’s your first day, you’ll get the hang of it. It’s still good!
C0BStitch2: ^I remember when I started my garden… I was so nervous! I even got my first vegetable order wrong.
C0BStitch3: ^It was for Mr. Fritz, from the general store. So of course he was super nice about it. He even paid me for the accidental stuff I bought!

C0EStitch1: ^Well, I gotta get to the garden, but I’ll be by again tomorrow. Don’t forget to take breaks, and stay hydrated!

C1Stitch2: ^Hehe! Hi friendo! Wow this is the shop? It looks so good! Achieving your dreams, so cool!
C1Stitch3: ^I can already tell, people are going to be here all the time! I mean, I know I will, hehe!
C1Stitch4: ^Oh! But let me stop rambling and actually order something! Um um ummm… oh I don’t know uhhhh… Ooh, <color=red>strawberries</color>! I’m in the mood for something berry sweet, hehe!
C1Stitch5: ^This is a much better way to curb my sweet tooth than eating kettle corn all the time. I can’t help myself, you know? It’s too good!
C1Stitch6: ^Hmmm… should I add something else? I don’t know! I mean whatever I choose is going to be good, I just know it! Your whole heart is in this place, I can feel it.
C1Stitch7: ^I got it! Add <color=red>milk</color> so it’s my favorite color- pink!

C1GStitch1: ^YUM! Oh hehe! I didn’t mean to yell! Gosh this is so good and fresh, friendo! Really hits the spot.
C1GStitch2: ^You know, I got a little sad this morning, thinking about my big sister. I’m excited she’s off learning new things, but I was really missing her. But then I remembered your shop opened today!
C1GStitch3: ^I’m gonna snap a picture of this to send to her. I can’t wait to bring her here on her next break!

C1BStitch1: ^O-oh! This isn’t what I ordered, I don’t think. But hey, sweet is sweet! And this is sweet, like you!
C1BStitch2: ^You know friendo, we’re going to have to get together for another board game night. Oh! What if we hosted them here! You would have to get someone else to work though.
C1BStitch3: ^Maybe ask that new guy who moved in, Flipper? He’s been looking for a second job, I think. Plus I think it would be a great way for him to get to know people!

C1EStitch1: ^I could just stay here forever! I wish I could today, but I have a tutoring session in a little bit I have to prepare for. I kinda forgot to finish my homework.
C1EStitch2: ^See ya later! Good luck with the rest of your day!

C2Stitch2: ^Hey, mate! I am so happy to see this place finally open. I’m really proud of you!
C2Stitch3: ^Sorry I have to pop in and pop out, but I did want to make sure I stop by. I already see what I want- one <color=red>banana</color> smoothie, please!
C2Stitch4: ^Did you know they’re great for cramps? I tend to get them when I’m working. I’m on my feet all day, bending down and standing up.
C2Stitch5: ^Oh, Mr. Flowers said to tell you congratulations. I saw him on the way over. He was on his morning walk, and asked if I would see you today!
C2Stitch6: ^Ah there I go again, my mind is everywhere! Busy day ahead of me.
C2Stitch7: ^You know what? Throw some <color=red>milk</color> and <color=red>ice</color> in there too! Make it extra creamy and cold!

C2GStitch1: ^Ooh that was so good! Can’t go wrong with bananas, you know?
C2GStitch2: ^Next time I'll try to come here with Mrs. Riley. She's recovering really nicely and should be out of the hospital next week!
C2GStitch3: ^She’s been talking non-stop about your smoothie shop opening.

C2BStitch1: ^A little different from my order but don’t worry about it, mate!
C2BStitch2: ^I was actually thinking of making this a regular outing place for the older people in our community to meet up!
C2BStitch3: ^I could arrange little lunch meet and greets. It would be a lovely way to get people out of the house.
C2BStitch4: ^Ah, just a thought… but if you like it, we can talk about it soon!

C2EStitch1: ^Look at the time! Sorry I’m in such a rush, mate. I left a little late this morning. I’ll be by again tomorrow. It’s my day off and I want to get one for myself and hang out awhile! Bye-bye!
